title: Morning Azkar
dua: اللّهُـمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّـي لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنـي وَأَنا عَبْـدُكَ، وَأَنا عَلـى عَهْـدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَـعْتُ، أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما صَنَـعْتُ، أَبـوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْـمَتِكَ عَلَـيَّ وَأَبـوءُ بِذَنْـبي فَاغْفِـرْ لي فَإِنَّهُ لا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنـوبَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ.
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity but You. You created me and I am Your servant, and I abide by Your covenant and promise as best as I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me, and I acknowledge my sin. So forgive me, for indeed, none forgives sins except You.
benefits: Protection from harm and guidance for the day.

title: Evening Azkar
dua: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَمْسَـيتُ أُشْهِـدُك وَأُشْهِـدُ حَمَلَـةَ عَرْشِكَ، وَمَلائِكَتَـكَ، وَجَمِيعَ خَلْقِكَ، أَنَّكَ أَنْتَ اللّهُ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ لا شَرِيـكَ لَكَ وَأَنَّ مُحَـمَّداً عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُولُـكَ.
translation: O Allah, I have entered this evening and call upon You, the bearers of Your Throne, Your angels, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshiped except You, alone, without partner, and that Muhammad is Your servant and Messenger.
benefits: Peace and tranquility throughout the night.

title: Before Sleep
translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.
benefits: Safety during sleep and peaceful rest.

title: After Fajr Prayer
dua: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ عِـلْماً نَافِـعاً، وَرِزْقاً طَيِّـباً، وَعَمَـلاً مُتَقَبَّـلاً.
translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and deeds that will be accepted.

title: Leaving the House
dua: بِسْمِ اللّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللّهِ، وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللّهِ.
translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no power and no strength except with Allah.
benefits: Protection from harm and guidance throughout the day.

title: Before Entering the Toilet
dua: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعُـوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الخُبْثِ وَالخَبَائِثِ.
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from all evil and evil-doers.

title: Before Eating
translation: In the name of Allah and with His blessings.
benefits: Blessings in food and prevention from harm.

title: After Eating
dua: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
translation: Praise be to Allah who has given us food and drink and made us Muslims.
benefits: Gratitude and blessings for the provision.

title: Waking Up
dua: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
translation: All praise is due to Allah, who revived us after causing us to die, and unto Him is the resurrection.

title: When Facing Difficulties
translation: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best disposer of affairs.
benefits: Reliance on Allah and relief from difficulties.
time_to_recite: During times of distress or hardship

title: When Entering the Mosque
translation: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.
benefits: Seeking mercy and blessings in worship.

title: When Leaving the Mosque
translation: O Allah, I ask You for Your bounty.
benefits: Seeking Allah’s favor in daily affairs.

title: Before Studying
dua: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي وَزِدْنِي عِلْمًا
translation: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, teach me what will benefit me, and increase me in knowledge.
time_to_recite: Before starting to study or learn

title: During Travel
dua: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنقَلِبُونَ
translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this (transport) to us, and we could never have it by our efforts. And surely, to our Lord, we must return.
time_to_recite: At the beginning of a journey

title: When in Distress
dua: اللّهُ اللّهُ رَبِّـي لا أُشْـرِكُ بِهِ شَيْـئاً
translation: Allah, Allah is my Lord; I do not associate anything with Him.
time_to_recite: In times of distress or anxiety
